block.p: Anne-Marie Sullivan Woodward and Dr. Chadd Alan Herrmann were married yesterday by Jean S. Kotkin, a leader of the Ethical Culture Society, at the Inn at Irving Place in New York.

Ms. Woodward, 29, is keeping her name. She is a freelance picture editor and a photographer in New York. She graduated from Emory University and received a master's degree in journalism from the University of Missouri. Her parents, Dr. Barbara Sullivan Woodward and Bob Woodward, live in Dubuque, Iowa, where her father is the chief executive of Woodward Communications, a media and printing company, which owns The Telegraph Herald, a daily newspaper. Her mother, a clinical psychologist, is a consultant to Finley Hospital Business Health, an occupational health service in Dubuque, and to the hospital's pain clinic.

Anne-Marie Woodward, Chadd Herrmann Anne-Marie Sullivan Woodward and Dr. Chadd Alan Herrmann were married yesterday by Jean S. Kotkin, a leader of the Ethical Culture Society, at the Inn at Irving Place in New York.
Anne-Marie Sullivan Woodward and Dr. Chadd Alan Herrmann were married yesterday by Jean S. Kotkin, a leader of the Ethical Culture Society, at the Inn at Irving Place in New York.

Ms. Woodward, 29, is keeping her name. She is a freelance picture editor and a photographer in New York. She graduated from Emory University and received a master's degree in journalism from the University of Missouri. Her parents, Dr. Barbara Sullivan Woodward and Bob Woodward, live in Dubuque, Iowa, where her father is the chief executive of Woodward Communications, a media and printing company, which owns The Telegraph Herald, a daily newspaper. Her mother, a clinical psychologist, is a consultant to Finley Hospital Business Health, an occupational health service in Dubuque, and to the hospital's pain clinic.

Dr. Herrmann, 36, is a resident in psychiatry at St. Vincent's Manhattan Hospital. A summa cum laude graduate of the University of Minnesota, he received a master's degree in philosophy from the University of Texas and a medical degree from the University of Wisconsin. His parents, Sandra and Gary Herrmann, live in Chetek, Wis. His mother manages the Chetek Beauty Shoppe. His father is a salesman in Eau Claire, Wis., for the Sara Lee Bakery Group.
